name: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi

quotes.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
quotes.quote: So what if you're an aristocrat?! Dying for the sake of honor is something an idiot does!

quotes.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
quotes.quote: The more you rush, the less careful you become. Even a cautious rat will show its tail.

quotes.character: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
quotes.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
quotes.quote: Death comes at the very end, doesn't it? Until that time comes, do your best at living!

quotes.character: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière
quotes.show: Zero no Tsukaima: Futatsuki no Kishi
quotes.quote: I don't want to die, either. But I'm an aristocrat. It's an honor to die for one's people. You make fun of it, but is it that insignificant to die for everyone else?
